name: @onivoro/nodejs-cli-sdk
description: Utils for building node command line interfaces

scripts.add-scripts: npm run build && node ./transpiled/cli/bind.js --name onx --path nodejs-cli-sdk
scripts.release: git pull --rebase && npm version minor && npm run build && cp package.json transpiled && git add . && git cam 'chore: release' && cd transpiled && npm publish --access public && git push

author: lee.e.norris@gmail.com
